keyFacts: The document details account activity for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for May 2015.
The ending balance of the account as of May 31, 2015, was $133,273.92.
Significant transactions include multiple preauthorized debits for payroll fees and utility payments.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for assistance regarding the account.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or questions about the account.
